professional_summary: Seasoned Risk Management Framework (RMF) Specialist with expertise in Oracle database administration and NIST compliance. Proven track record in high-pressure environments with a focus on cyber security and IT infrastructure.

key_responsibilities: Implementing RMF processes and ensuring compliance with NIST standards.
Providing technical leadership for IT security initiatives and tools development.
Managing Oracle database environments with focus on performance optimization.
Supporting Oracle installations on VM Virtual Box for development purposes.
Managing database security and user access controls.
Coordinating space management with UNIX/LINUX administrators.
